英文法規名稱: Standard on Categories of Observation Instruments of Exclusive Observation Stations Obligatory for Calibration
中文法規名稱: 專用觀測站應經校驗之觀測儀器類別標準

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is enacted in accordance with the terms in the fifth paragraph of Article 20, Meteorological Act.
This Standard shall become effective on the date of promulgation.
